name: Banjo-Kazooie New Horizons
summary: Banjo-Kazooie New Horizons is a fanmade, unofficial Banjo Kazooie romhack by Bynine Studio. Inspired by all the Animal Crossing games, you're tasked with hunting down Jiggies in bustling Jiggytown while helping your neighbors, combating vicious fish and insects, and much more.
